thread.section_title: HotelsClick.com Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per HotelsClick.com | www.hotelsclick.com
thread.title: Serry Mahmoud
thread.title_full: HotelsClick.com recensione scritta da Serry Mahmoud

author: Serry Mahmoud
title: Serry Mahmoud
text: I did a mistake and reserved a room by mistake earlier than the travel date and despite the fact that I contacted Hotelsclick after checkout date and their right to apply the noshow policy, they refunded me in full and did not deduct any fees or charges. Deeply appreciated Hotelsclick
